spec_data.Name: perl-Geo-ShapeFile
spec_data.Description:
The Geo::ShapeFile module reads ESRI ShapeFiles containing GIS mapping
data, it has support for shp (shape), shx (shape index), and dbf (data
base) formats.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:57:31 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl extension for handling ESRI GIS Shapefiles
